languages.text: "Свет Терры, не покинь меня в час нужды, не оставь во тьме".
"Light of Terra, do not forsake me in my hour of need. Do not abandon me in the dark."
languages.original_text: "Свет Терры, не покинь меня в час нужды, не оставь во тьме".

traits.locale_text: "Light of Terra, do not forsake me in my hour of need, do not leave me in the dark."
"Light of Terra, do not forsake me in my hour of need, do not leave me in the dark."
"Light of Terra, do not forsake me in my hour of need. Do not abandon me in the dark."
"Light of Terra, do not forsake me in my hour of need. Do not abandon me in the dark."
"Light of Terra, do not forsake me in my hour of need. Do not abandon me in the dark."
"Light of Terra, do not forsake me in my hour of need. Do not abandon me in the dark."

languages.text: «Luz de Terra, no me abandones en mi momento de necesidad. No me abandones en la oscuridad».
languages.original_text: "Light of Terra, do not forsake me in my hour of need. Do not abandon me in the dark."

traits.locale_text: «Luz de Terra, no me abandones en mi momento de necesidad. No me abandones en la oscuridad».

languages.text: 「テラの光よ、今はどうか、見捨てないでください。暗闇に置いていかないでください」
languages.original_text: "Light of Terra, do not forsake me in my hour of need. Do not abandon me in the dark."

traits.locale_text: 「テラの光よ、今はどうか、見捨てないでください。暗闇に置いていかないでください」

languages.text: “泰拉之光在上，请不要在我需要的时候抛弃我，请不要把我遗弃在黑暗之中。”
languages.original_text: "Light of Terra, do not forsake me in my hour of need. Do not abandon me in the dark."

traits.locale_text: “泰拉之光在上，请不要在我需要的时候抛弃我，请不要把我遗弃在黑暗之中。”

languages.text: "Licht Terras, lasst mich in meiner Stunde der Not nicht allein. Lasst mich in der Dunkelheit nicht allein."
languages.original_text: "Light of Terra, do not forsake me in my hour of need. Do not abandon me in the dark."

traits.locale_text: "Licht Terras, lasst mich in meiner Stunde der Not nicht allein. Lasst mich in der Dunkelheit nicht allein."

languages.text: « Lumière de Terra, ne m'abandonne pas. Ne m'abandonne pas dans les ténèbres. »
languages.original_text: "Light of Terra, do not forsake me in my hour of need. Do not abandon me in the dark."

traits.locale_text: « Lumière de Terra, ne m'abandonne pas. Ne m'abandonne pas dans les ténèbres. »

languages.text: "Terra'nın ışığı, zor zamanlarımda beni terk etme. Beni karanlıkta bir başıma bırakma."
languages.original_text: "Light of Terra, do not forsake me in my hour of need. Do not abandon me in the dark."
